Time management

    Developer Response
reviews.review: I have enjoyed using nurse grid for the last 5 years! It has helped me to not miss a shift and make adjustments based on my employers schedule grid. I can just open up the app and adjust easily what is listed online. It also helps me keep track of the shifts I charge, precept, attend education, PTO, time off and of course payday. It‚Äôs a quick reference guide when called to ask if you can work extra! Nurse grid also helps me to know and manage MY work time versus FAMILY time. I love the color options and icons. I even use nurse grid as my Calendar versus my phone or wall calendar! If I could change one thing about nurse grid though it would be the option to be able to see at least two items on the actual day of each month instead of just one or tapping to see if there is any pertinent items scheduled for your shift. For example, if I‚Äôm charging and precepting on the same shift I would like to see ‚ÄúC‚Äù and ‚ÄúP‚Äù on the display calendar instead of clicking each date to view details. Thank you nurse grid! more Hi there! Thanks so much for your review and feedback, we truly appreciate it!
